addonManifest.name: MongoDB
addonManifest.description: Provides MongoDB databases scoped to a development team.
addonManifest.deploymentNotes: This add-on assumes that you already have a MongoDB instance running. If authentication is enabled, an admin username and password are needed to create client databases, otherwise they should be left blank. The location field should be the hostname/ip of the MongoDB instance. In configuration you can set the port, otherwise the default port of 27017 will be used.
addonManifest.developerHelp: When deploying a new MongoDB database you need to specify the credentials you want to use in your app to connect to this database. These credentials should be passed in using the developerOptions argument in the following format: username=<username>,password=<password>
addonManifest.author: Jazmine Olinger
